Todo and Journal Chrome Extension with AI-Powered Analysis
(For Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and Chromium-based browsers)

-----------------------------------------------------------
H O M E P A G E: https://avchrono.com/

D E M O and U S A G E:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CcDv9Qekry4

D A T A   P R I V A C Y:
Your data is safe. All Todo and Journal data is stored locally in your browser's memory (unless you click on AI analysis). Through the advanced settings, you have the option to register your plugin with our website to receive updates, exclusive offers, and additional customization options. 
-----------------------------------------------------------

Boost Your Productivity
The Todo and Journaling Plugin is designed to optimize your workflow and enhance productivity, all within a sleek Chrome Extension. Manage your tasks and journal entries seamlessly, with the added power of AI to analyze and prioritize your work.

AI-Powered Task Management
Let AI help you to organize and streamline your task execution. Get suggestions on prioritizing unfinished tasks and receive recommendations on completing important tasks efficiently.

Intuitive User Interface
Effortlessly add, edit, and complete tasks with just a click. Whether you’re managing work assignments, personal errands, or miscellaneous to-dos, our plugin is built to simplify your life. Add new tasks with an estimated time of arrival (ETA), categorize them into office, personal, or other lists, and stay organized like never before. Customize the interface to show or hide your Journal/Diary entries or lists as per your needs.

Look and Feel – Customize Your Experience
We believe in personalization. Choose from five distinct theme colors to suit your style, whether you prefer calm blues or energizing oranges. Easily change themes and personalize your workspace to match your mood.

SIDEBAR support for persistent view of Todo and Journal

Seamless Sync and Auto-Upgrades
Enjoy automatic synchronization across all Chrome browsers under the same profile, ensuring you can seamlessly transition between devices without missing a beat. Plus, with auto-upgrade features and persistent data storage, your tasks and journal entries are always up to date.

Effortless Journaling
Our auto-save functionality ensures your journal entries are securely saved and easily accessible. Navigate through past entries with ease, whether you’re reflecting on memories or gaining insights from your past reflections.

Get Started Today!
Install the Todo and Journaling System Chrome Extension now and take your productivity to the next level. With powerful features, vibrant themes, and seamless syncing, achieving your goals has never been easier.

-----------------------------------------------------------

K E Y   F E A T U R E S:
To-Do Lists:
- Quickly add tasks with ETA.
- Separate lists for office, personal, and other tasks.
- AI-powered task analysis and prioritization.
- Easily edit or mark tasks as complete.
- One-click deletion of tasks.

Themes:
- Five customizable color themes.
- Font size customization for a personalized experience (available with free registration).

Journal:
- Auto-save daily journal entries.
- Effortless navigation through past entries.

Sync and Upgrade:
- Automatic data synchronization across all Chrome browsers.
- Auto-upgrade to keep your system up to date with persistent data storage.

-----------------------------------------------------------

Have specific needs? Reach out, and we'll help tailor the plugin to your preferences.
